metadata.title: RZ/Five: Is there a PMIC that can be used in combination with the RZ/Five?

sections.content:
Question:
Is there a PMIC that can be used in combination with the RZ/Five? 
Answer:
We provide a PMIC (DA9062)  for the RZ/Five
https://www.renesas.com/us/en/products/power-power-management/multi-channel-power-management-ics-pmics/ssdsoc-power-management-ics-pmic-and-pmus/da9062-designed-applications-requiring-85
Suitable Products
RZ/Five
